price: 12. (niet alleen Qoeraysh verloochende hun profeet maar) ook vóór hen, het volk van Noah, en de bewoners van Rass en de Thamoed.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
